title: Steel dagger

properties.name: description
properties.value: The steel dagger is a dagger made out of steel. They can be a possible loot from pickpocketing H.A.M. Members or as a drop from Kalphite Workers. The steel dagger can also be bought from the Varrock Swordshop in Varrock. Steel daggers can be smithed from a single steel bar at level 30 Smithing. Each steel dagger created grants 37.5 experience. Steel daggers are the sixth strongest daggers in RuneScape, the next strongest being both the black and white daggers. Like all steel weapons, steel daggers require 5 Attack to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be poisoned.

The steel dagger is a dagger made out of steel. They can be a possible loot from pickpocketing H.A.M. Members or as a drop from Kalphite Workers. The steel dagger can also be bought from the Varrock Swordshop in Varrock. Steel daggers can be smithed from a single steel bar at level 30 Smithing. Each steel dagger created grants 37.5 experience. Steel daggers are the sixth strongest daggers in RuneScape, the next strongest being both the black and white daggers. Like all steel weapons, steel daggers require 5 Attack to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be poisoned.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Steel dagger(+)" to "Steel dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Steel dagger(s)" to "Steel dagger(p++)".

The '''steel dagger''' is a [[dagger]] made out of [[Steel equipment|steel]]. They can be a possible loot from [[pickpocket]]ing [[H.A.M. Member]]s or as a drop from [[Kalphite Worker]]s. The steel dagger can also be bought from the [[Varrock Swordshop]] in [[Varrock]]. Steel daggers can be smithed from a single [[steel bar]] at level 30 [[Smithing]]. Each steel dagger created grants 37.5 experience. Steel daggers are the sixth strongest daggers in ''[[RuneScape]]'', the next strongest being both the [[black dagger|black]] and [[white dagger|white]] daggers. Like all [[steel weapons]], steel daggers require 5 [[Attack]] to wield. As with all daggers, this weapon can be [[Weapon poison|poisoned]].
